summary: Completed iteration 4 frontend testing of MyYard. Homepage, login, and register pages load correctly. Browse page UI loads with all filters but shows 'Failed to load properties' due to DNS resolution failure for Supabase URL (pbyhhzygikyucqogitwj.supabase.co) from container network.

integration_issues.issue: Supabase API calls fail with ERR_NAME_NOT_RESOLVED - DNS cannot resolve pbyhhzygikyucqogitwj.supabase.co from container network

action_items: INFRASTRUCTURE ISSUE: DNS resolution for Supabase URL (pbyhhzygikyucqogitwj.supabase.co) is failing from the container network. This is not a code issue - the Supabase client configuration is correct.
The external preview URL (https://6df00ee2-7aa4-41d1-addf-5991ece753cf.preview.emergentagent.com/) returning 502 is likely related to the same network/DNS issue.
critical_code_review_comments: Supabase client configuration in /app/lib/supabase.ts is correct
Browse page correctly handles both price_per_month and rent_amount fields via getRentAmount() helper
Settings page correctly uses is_active boolean for leases query
Null safety is properly implemented for location/address fields

success_rate.frontend: 75% (3/4 pages load correctly, browse page has network issue)

context_for_next_testing_agent: DNS resolution for Supabase URL is failing from container network. Homepage (localhost:3000) loads correctly with MyYard branding. Login page (/auth/login) loads with email, password fields and Sign In button. Register page (/auth/register) loads with role selection (Tenant/Landlord), name, email, password fields. Browse page (/browse) UI loads with all filters (Township, Property Type, Min Bedrooms, Price Range, Reset Filters) but Supabase API calls fail with ERR_NAME_NOT_RESOLVED.
infrastructure_notes: The Supabase URL (pbyhhzygikyucqogitwj.supabase.co) cannot be resolved from the container network. Python socket.gethostbyname() returns 'Name or service not known'. This is an infrastructure/network configuration issue, not a code bug.
